blogPost.excerpt: Teach without videos and zoom sessions. We enable best minds to share their knowledge in minutes. Average time to launch a course is 2 months. Launch your course under 2 minutes with Questbook. What Twitter has done to blogging, Questbook does to learning.
blogPost.body: Teach without videos and zoom sessions. We enable best minds to share their knowledge in minutes. Average time to launch a course is 2 months. Launch your course under 2 minutes with Questbook. What Twitter has done to blogging, Questbook does to learning.
blogPost.title: QuestBook - The fastest way to teach and learn
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 无需视频和变焦课程的教学。我们让最优秀的人才能够在几分钟内分享他们的知识。推出一个课程的平均时间是2个月。使用Questbook在2分钟内推出您的课程。Twitter对博客的作用，Questbook对学习的作用。
無需視頻和變焦課程的教學。我們讓最優秀的人才能夠在幾分鐘內分享他們的知識。推出一個課程的平均時間是2個月。使用Questbook在2分鐘內推出您的課程。Twitter對博客的作用，Questbook對學習的作用。
